Let A be the set of al prime factors of 2310 and f : A  be the function f(x) = 3^{2}^{2}x logx^{5}             . The number of one-to-one functions from A to the range of f is : (1) 20 (2) 120 (3) 25 (4) 24\)

X + 4
Y is equal to ______.
